description: Gets information for the specified stage.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: ARN of the stage for which the information is to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: Stage ARN.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Stage name.

nested_items.name: activeSessionId
nested_items.description: ID of the active session within the stage.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoParticipantRecordingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration object for individual participant recording, attached to the stage.

nested_items.name: storageConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the  StorageConfiguration resource to use for individual participant recording. Default: "" (empty string, no storage configuration is specified). Individual participant recording cannot be started unless a storage configuration is specified, when a  Stage is created or updated. To disable individual participant recording, set this to ""; other fields in this object will get reset to their defaults when sending "".

nested_items.name: mediaTypes
nested_items.description: Types of media to be recorded. Default: AUDIO_VIDEO.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: thumbnailConfiguration
nested_items.description: A complex type that allows you to enable/disable the recording of thumbnails for individual participant recording and modify the interval at which thumbnails are generated for the live session.

nested_items.name: targetIntervalSeconds
nested_items.description: The targeted thumbnail-generation interval in seconds. This is configurable only if recordingMode is INTERVAL. Default: 60.

nested_items.name: storage
nested_items.description: Indicates the format in which thumbnails are recorded. SEQUENTIAL records all generated thumbnails in a serial manner, to the media/thumbnails/high directory. LATEST saves the latest thumbnail in media/latest_thumbnail/high/thumb.jpg and overwrites it at the interval specified by targetIntervalSeconds. You can enable both SEQUENTIAL and LATEST. Default: SEQUENTIAL.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: recordingMode
nested_items.description: Thumbnail recording mode. Default: DISABLED.

nested_items.name: recordingReconnectWindowSeconds
nested_items.description: If a stage publisher disconnects and then reconnects within the specified interval, the multiple recordings will be considered a single recording and merged together.

nested_items.name: hlsConfiguration
nested_items.description: HLS configuration object for individual participant recording.

nested_items.name: targetSegmentDurationSeconds
nested_items.description: Defines the target duration for recorded segments generated when recording a stage participant. Segments may have durations longer than the specified value when needed to ensure each segment begins with a keyframe. Default: 6.

nested_items.name: endpoints
nested_items.description: Summary information about various endpoints for a stage.

nested_items.name: events
nested_items.description: Events endpoint.

nested_items.name: whip
nested_items.description: The endpoint to be used for IVS real-time streaming using the WHIP protocol.

nested_items.name: rtmp
nested_items.description: The endpoint to be used for IVS real-time streaming using the RTMP protocol.

nested_items.name: rtmps
nested_items.description: The endpoint to be used for IVS real-time streaming using the RTMPS protocol.
